name: backend
description: `    src       ├── app.js			app entry point       ├── /api              controller layer: api routes       ├── /config			config settings, env variables       ├── /services         service layer: business logic       ├── /models           data access layer: database models	       ├── /scripts          miscellaneous NPM scripts       ├── /subscribers      async event handlers       └── /test             test suites `
